## Redaction & Safety Checklist

- [ ] All new attachments/links have sensitivity flags (`public`/`internal`/`restricted`)
- [ ] No Confluence/JIRA/NPAW/company URLs in public content
- [ ] I ran external validation locally (`npm run validate:external`)
- [ ] Manager/security added as reviewers for sensitive paths

## Summary

Describe the change and why it is safe for internal/external builds.
